awe6.core.InputJoypad

type
class
implements
awe6.interfaces.IInputJoypad
The InputJoypad class provides a minimalist implementation of the IInputJoypad interface.

For API documentation please review the corresponding Interfaces.

Constructor

new(kernel : awe6.interfaces.IKernel, up : awe6.interfaces.EKey, right : awe6.interfaces.EKey, down : awe6.interfaces.EKey, left : awe6.interfaces.EKey, primary : awe6.interfaces.EKey, secondary : awe6.interfaces.EKey, upAlt : awe6.interfaces.EKey, rightAlt : awe6.interfaces.EKey, downAlt : awe6.interfaces.EKey, leftAlt : awe6.interfaces.EKey, primaryAlt : awe6.interfaces.EKey, secondaryAlt : awe6.interfaces.EKey)

Instance Methods

getButtonDownDuration( type : awe6.interfaces.EJoypadButton, ?asTime : Bool, ?isPrevious : Bool ) : Float

getButtonUpDuration( type : awe6.interfaces.EJoypadButton, ?asTime : Bool, ?isPrevious : Bool ) : Float

getIsButtonDown( type : awe6.interfaces.EJoypadButton ) : Bool

getIsButtonPress( type : awe6.interfaces.EJoypadButton ) : Bool

getIsButtonRelease( type : awe6.interfaces.EJoypadButton ) : Bool
